welcome_message_body: Welcome to Buckeye, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities! Known for its beautiful desert landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore our vibrant community and enjoy all that Buckeye has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buckeye Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Buckeye Municipal Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Litchfield Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Litchfield Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
